values: How to Love Your People: The Gladness of Your People and the Glory of GodHow to Love Your People: The Gladness of Your People and the Glory of God

If pastors are going to labor for the joy of their people, as Paul says in 2 Corinthians 1:24, then they must first make it their priority to pursue their own joy in the Lord.
